sentence.text: Roman lowered himself casually into his large executive swivel-chair behind his desk , and directed a dispassionate , shuttered gaze across the neat expanse of tooled dark green leather .
I am looking thoughtful , but she is in no mood for meaningful gazes across the room .
Her confidence was coming back now , so that she felt able to meet his gaze across the width of the small table .
Gina paused to pass her approving gaze around the rest of the room .
` Meaning is a certain way of directing one 's gaze at an item of one 's own experience " ( Schutz , 1972. 42 ) .
She bit her lip instantly , regretting her outburst as much as she regretted ever catching his gaze at that ill-fated cocktail party .
Then they stepped into the airlock , after a last lingering gaze between Mala and her Ardakkean .

His words faded , and he put his hands on her shoulders again and turned her face him , holding her gaze by the sheer power of his will until , steeled and strengthened by her desperate need to break the spell , Merrill wrenched herself away to open the car door .
He dropped his gaze from her face to his empty bowl .
Lowering her gaze from the intense sunlight reflected on the upper walls to the leaded doors , she placed a foot on the first stone step .
Jim tore his anxious gaze from the road and their glances met .
` Clever Miss Prim , " he murmured , swivelling his enigmatic gaze in her direction .
It was the excuse for her deep delaying gaze into the looking-glass .
The gaze of the bachelors , wrote Harsnet .
And under the green hypnotic gaze of Lucy , a suspicious wild cat , sheathing its claws and desiring a hearth , a heart .

Then we returned to our house under the gaze of the neighbours .
She ran her gaze over Maggie 's dress and her lips tightened .
Paul Binyon followed Culley 's gaze round the bleak room .
He swore softly , colourfully , his face like granite as he swept a gaze round the room before lifting her into his arms and carrying her from the house .
He shifted his gaze to Sonny .
Herbie diverted his gaze to them , whereby they both took a sudden renewed interest in their game .
It was Corrary who pointed , and drew their gaze to the dark shadow on the water .
The note of quiet desperation in her friend 's voice drew Lindsey 's gaze to Jill 's flushed face , causing her own smile to fade .
` I do n't think there 's any chance of Jamie becoming chairman , " Damian drawled coolly , and flicked his piercing blue gaze to Rachel .
She broke this news to me gently , casting her clear gaze towards the window in preference to seeing my hurt .
Rows of simple wooden benches drew her gaze towards the altar , where candles burned beside a tall , plain wooden crucifix .
Detective-Constable Barnes turned his benevolent gaze upon her with pleasure .
His gaze was very steady , totally concentrated .
She gave him a basilisk gaze and he tried to dispose of his long legs around the legs of the Sheraton chair .
With an effort she pulled her gaze away from the tall figure clad in blue trousers and black T-shirt .
Hope looked keenly at the man , held his gaze a moment -- a glance which could have ruled a line straight from eye to eye -- and then snapped to attention .
Shiona dropped her gaze away .
